sentence.Network_en: His dissolute life is inconsistent with his Puritan upbringing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的放荡生活和他的清教徒教养相悖.

sentence.Network_en: You can't deny that Tom has been an ilde, worthless, dissolute and dishonourable rogue.
sentence.Network_cn: 你也不能否认汤姆是个游手好闲 、 一钱不值 、 放荡无耻的坏蛋吧.

sentence.Network_en: You can't deny that Tom has been an idle, worthless, dissolute and dishonorable rogue.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不能否认汤姆是个游手好闲 、 一钱不值 、 放荡无耻的坏蛋.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... absolve v 免罪 dissolute a 放荡的；荒淫的 dissolve v 溶解；分解.
佚字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 弃用;逃亡〖 bediscarded;escape〗 放荡;放纵〖 dissolute〗 通“逸”。安逸〖 easy〗.
字典中逸字的解释 ... (3) 疾速[ quick] (4) 放纵;荒淫[ dissolute] (2) 同本义[ escape].
佚字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 弃用;逃亡〖 bediscarded;escape〗 放荡;放纵〖 dissolute〗 通“逸”。安逸〖 easy〗.

list.abs: dissoluble 可溶的dissolution basin 溶蚀盆地dissolution of a joint venture 合营企业解散
dissolubility 溶解度dissolution system 药物溶解仪dissolvent 溶剂，溶媒
chemical desalting 化学脱盐chemical dissolution 化学溶解chemical element 化学元素
fractional decomposition 分级分解fractional dissolution 分级溶解fractional distillation 分馏

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin dissolutus 'disconnected, loose', from the verb dissolvere (see dissolve)

entry.def: Someone who is dissolute does not care at all about morals and lives in a way that is considered to be wicked and immoral.

auth_sentence.content: Untimely deaths occasioned by a dissolute course of life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Untimely deaths occasioned by a dissolute course of life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Untimely deaths occasioned by a dissolute course of life.

auth_sentence.content: A grossly dissolute and unprincipled young man.
auth_sentence.res_content: A grossly dissolute and unprincipled young man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A grossly dissolute and unprincipled young man.

auth_sentence.content: The dissolute and riotous conduct of...its inhabitants.
auth_sentence.res_content: The dissolute and riotous conduct of...its inhabitants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The dissolute and riotous conduct of...its inhabitants.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+solut溶解+e→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
absolute[adj.绝对的,完全的;确实的,肯定的]+ly表副词→adv.完全地, 绝对地
absolute[adj.绝对的,完全的;确实的,肯定的]+ism主义→absolutism
resolute[adj.坚决的,果断的]+ion表名词→n.坚决,决心;决定,决议

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除
